ygData.subject: Re: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have to agree with the Shadow Step being left alone. Great escape/dueling spell. Voice Graft? Need anyone say more. I was practicing my Evoke  one day,
ygData.messageBody:
--- Brian Hook <bhook@...> wrote:
> From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>
>
> Okay, here's a question for you folks. What if
> Shadow Step and Voice Graft were replaced with some
> kind of lifetap spells? Would
> this be grossly unbalancing or hurt the class?
>
> If we tune the SK we can't really ADD new spells,
> since this would give them more spells than the
> other hybrids at each rank.
>
> Brian
>
>



I have to agree with the Shadow Step being left alone.
Great escape/dueling spell.

Voice Graft? Need anyone say more.

I was practicing my Evoke one day, casting Ward
Undead on my pet. Out of shear boredom, i cast Voice
Graft. A level 50 Paladins walks by, and thru my pet i
give him a how-do-ya-do.

He stops and laughs and says to me "that another one
of those useless SK spells?" I say "Yup, its my reward
for working my butt off to reach level 30".

He laughs again and runs off.

Someone claims Voice Graft has RP value? Ummm...if you
say so.

It needs to go.

I, like others, fear the Lifetaps we would get. Most
likely it would take too much time/mana to be bothered
with in combat.
If we got a GOOD lifedrain. Fine. But i am very
skeptical.

I would rather have it replaced with another utility
spell such as Cure Disease. Just like Necros, whatever
we call up, we should be able to put down. We can
Disease something, we should be able to get rid of it.


Thats just a suggestion that has more of a chance of
going thru as opposed to Lifedrain that would actually
help us. As mentioned, whichever lifedrain they give
us would most likely be too low of one to be really
useful.

Damage shield like Banshee would have been great.
A boost to VE would make sense. I stand by VE, even in
its current state. No you cant rely on it to heal you,
but it is a great in-combat spell. Damages and heals
some in addition to your swing. Its free basically
damage/heal. Cast before a fight, so no in battle time
wasted. And when it hits, its guaranteed. No
variation. At level 34, when it hits, its for
18DMG/Heal everytime.


Bathory D'Allatu
